source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: SolidWorks Motion Complete Course
items.headline: Mechanism Simulation
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to create powerfull simulations and animations of machines and mechanisms. we will work on 10 projects of different mechanical architectures to give you full mastery on Solidworks Motion.  You will learn exactly how to prepare your assemblies for simulation, how to apply motion elements such as motors, gravity, physical contact, external forces and most importantly how to extract accurate engineering data from your simulations. You will be able, among other things, to determine the power consumption and torque necessaries for your mechanism to work properly.
The course covers a number of differente mechanisms and the list will grow bigger in time as I add new videos. We will simulate the motion of the following mechanisms

Crank Shaft Belt Driven Linear Actuator  Disk Cam Application Cartesian Manipulator - Rack and Pinion Geneva Wheel Barrel Cam - Linear Applicaton Barrel Cam - Angular Application Spring Animation Walkthrought - 2 Differente Methods

items.title: After Effects :Create Lower Thirds Animation For Your Videos
items.headline: Learn-by-doing approach course; guiding  you through creating Lower Thirds with different techniques in After Effects
objectives_summary: ACQUIRE some powerful skills & techniques to design your own professional video titles ( Lower Thirds ) using Adobe After Effects
Create SOCIAL MEDIA Lower Thirds (Video Titles) using Adobe After Effects
Create TV NEWS Lower Thirds (Video Titles) using Adobe After Effects

items.title: 3D Resin Printing: From Start to Finish

How to Use Chitobox to Prepare Your 3D Files for Printing
